OOC: Intercepting shots? Read da rules, I think, Rudra, just to see where

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 24, 2001 11:03 PM
Subject: Re: Trinity


> OOC: Umm ... about activating all of the codes.  Obfucious didn't touch
your
> program.  All he did was look at the code so he didn't have to start from
> scratch.
>
> ::Aerotaur::
>     Aerotaur flinches as Grounded's blasts fly past his head.  He wonders
> silently why Grounded shot at Deemos when he was so close.  He spots the
> knives flying at Trinity and he deftly sprints in front of them.  He
manages
> to deflect on with his wing but the other imbeds itself in his shoulder.
> "YOU WILL DIE!!!!!"  His left arm hangs limp from the knife in his
shoulder.
> He reaches up and yanks it out of his skin.  Mech fluid sprays onto the
> ground.  Using only his right arm he flings the knife back at Deemos.  "He
is
> mine Grounded.  This is an old battle.  Keep Trinity safe."  With that
said
> he launches himself at Deemos.  He begins slashing at his head with his
> energy-bladed staff.
>
>
